h2_title: The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you spot the boss leaping upward into the air, assume he's likely to slam down with his tail with surprising range. He can do this twice while twisting his body to the side, but later on he'll add a delayed final strike as he moves into a frontal flip.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Scorpionlord.md', within the main section titled 'The Scorpionlord', specifically from the subsection 'The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you spot the boss leaping upward into the air, assume he's likely to slam down with his tail with surprising range. He can do this twice while twisting his body to the side, but later on he'll add a delayed final strike as he moves into a frontal flip.
